void NE_APISystemEnd (void)
 Ends API system and all memory used by it.

Detailed Description

Functions to create buttons, check boxes, radio buttons and slidebars.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum NE_APIState

API states.

Enumerator:
NE_Error  API hasn't been updated or input hasn't been updated.
NE_None  Not pressed.
NE_Pressed  Just pressed.
NE_Held  Held.
NE_Clicked  Just released.

enum NE_APITypes

API object types.

Enumerator:
NE_Button  Simple button.
NE_CheckBox  Check Box.
NE_RadioButton  Radio button.
NE_SlideBar  Slide bar.

Function Documentation

void NE_APIButtonConfig ( NE_APIObj *  btn,
NE_Material *  material,
u32  color,
u32  alpha,
NE_Material *  pressedmaterial,
u32  pressedcolor,
u32  pressedalpha 
)

Configures given button's material, color and alpha.

Parameters:
btn Button to configure.
material Default (not-pressed) texture.
color Default (not-pressed) color.
alpha Default (not-pressed) alpha value...
pressedmaterial Pressed texture.
pressedcolor Pressed color...
pressedalpha Pressed alpha value...

NE_APIObj* NE_APIButtonCreate ( s16  x1,
s16  y1,
s16  x2,
s16  y2 
)

Returns a pointer to a new button.

Parameters:
x1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
y1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
x2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
y2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.

void NE_APICheckBoxConfig ( NE_APIObj *  chbx,
NE_Material *  materialtrue,
NE_Material *  materialfalse,
u32  color,
u32  alpha,
u32  pressedcolor,
u32  pressedalpha 
)

Configures given check box's material, color and alpha.

Parameters:
chbx Check box to configure.
materialtrue Texture used when is checked.
materialfalse Texture used when is NOT checked.
color Color when not pressed.
alpha Alpha when not pressed.
pressedcolor Color when pressed.
pressedalpha Alpha when pressed.

NE_APIObj* NE_APICheckBoxCreate ( s16  x1,
s16  y1,
s16  x2,
s16  y2,
bool  initialvalue 
)

Returns a pointer to a new check button.

Parameters:
x1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
y1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
x2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
y2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
initialvalue If true, checkbox is created in "checked" state.

Returns true if given check box is checked.

Parameters:
chbx Check box.

void NE_APIDraw ( void   ) 

Do I really have to explain what does this function do?

You have to call NE_2DViewInit() before this.

NE_APIState NE_APIObjectGetEvent ( NE_APIObj *  obj  ) 

Returns current event of any object.

Parameters:
obj Pointer to the object.
It returns a NE_APIState element. If obj is a slide bar, returns (event_button_a | event_button_b | event_button_bar).

void NE_APIRadioButtonConfig ( NE_APIObj *  rdbtn,
NE_Material *  materialtrue,
NE_Material *  materialfalse,
u32  color,
u32  alpha,
u32  pressedcolor,
u32  pressedalpha 
)

Configures given radio button's material, color and alpha.

Parameters:
rdbtn Radio button to configure.
materialtrue Texture used when is checked.
materialfalse Texture used when is NOT checked.
color Color when not pressed.
alpha Alpha when not pressed.
pressedcolor Color when pressed.
pressedalpha Alpha when pressed.

NE_APIObj* NE_APIRadioButtonCreate ( s16  x1,
s16  y1,
s16  x2,
s16  y2,
int  group,
bool  initialvalue 
)

Returns a pointer to a new radio button.

Parameters:
x1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
y1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
x2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
y2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
group Radio button group.
initialvalue If true, button is created in "checked" state and resets other buttons in same group.

bool NE_APIRadioButtonGetValue ( NE_APIObj *  rdbtn  ) 

Returns true if given radio button is checked.

Parameters:
rdbtn Radio button.

void NE_APISlideBarConfig ( NE_APIObj *  sldbar,
NE_Material *  matbtn,
NE_Material *  matbarbtn,
NE_Material *  matbar,
u32  normalcolor,
u32  pressedcolor,
u32  barcolor,
u32  alpha,
u32  pressedalpha,
u32  baralpha 
)

Configures given slide bar's material, color and alpha.

Parameters:
sldbar Slide bar to configure.
matbtn Button's texture.
matbarbtn Sliding button's texture.
matbar Bar texture.
normalcolor Normal button's color.
pressedcolor Pressed button's color.
barcolor Bar color.
alpha Normal button's alpha.
pressedalpha Pressed button's alpha.
baralpha Bar alpha.

NE_APIObj* NE_APISlideBarCreate ( s16  x1,
s16  y1,
s16  x2,
s16  y2,
int  min,
int  max,
int  initialvalue 
)

Returns a pointer to a slide bar. It checks if it is vertical or horizontal.

Parameters:
x1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
y1 (x1,y1) Upper left corner.
x2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
y2 (x2,y2) Down right corner.
min Min. value (it can be negative).
max Max. value (it can be negative).
initialvalue Initial value.
You shouldn't give too big numbers to min and max. Sliding button's size changes between 1 and 100 of difference.

int NE_APISlideBarGetValue ( NE_APIObj *  sldbr  ) 

Returns given slide bar's value.

Parameters:
sldbr Slide bar.

void NE_APISlideBarSetMinMax ( NE_APIObj *  sldbr,
int  min,
int  max 
)

Configures given slide bar's min. and max. values.

Parameters:
sldbr Slide bar to configure.
min Min (it can be negative).
max Max (it can be negative).
You shouldn't give too big numbers. Sliding button's size changes between 1 and 100 of difference.

void NE_APISystemReset ( int  number_of_objects  ) 

Resets the API system and sets the maximun number of objects.

Parameters:
number_of_objects Number of objects. If it is less than 1, it will create space for NE_API_DEFAULT_OBJECTS.
